text: Anata gata wa, zaisan ya seikatsu nado ni tsuite kanarazu kokoromi ni au. Soshite anata gata izen ni keiten o kudasa reta mono kara mo, tashinkyo to kara mo, oku no waru ro o kikasa rerudearou. Daga anata gata ga taeshinonde omo o osorerunaraba, hontoni sore wa, monogoto o ketsudan shi nashitogeru koto ni naru
